meanings.definition: The position or period of being a trainee.
meanings.sent1: During my traineeship, I learned a lot about the company.
meanings.sent2: She completed a traineeship at the hospital to become a nurse.
meanings.sent3: The traineeship was like a journey through the world of work.
meanings.sent4: His traineeship was a stepping stone to his dream job.
meanings.sent5: The traineeship was a valuable opportunity for hands-on learning.

meanings.definition: A program or course designed to provide practical experience in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The traineeship offered hands-on experience in marketing strategies.
meanings.sent2: Many students apply for traineeships to gain real-world skills.
meanings.sent3: The traineeship felt like a crash course in professional development.
meanings.sent4: Her traineeship was a bridge between classroom learning and workplace reality.
meanings.sent5: The traineeship was a practical way to learn new skills in a supportive environment.
